alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 647 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles west of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 50 miles southwest of Snowville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Gunnison Island and Lakeside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
